full_text:
Countries suspending use of AstraZeneca coronavirus vaccine as precaution:

- Denmark
- Norway
- Ireland
- Estonia
- The Netherlands
- Thailand
- Bulgaria
- Iceland
- Lithuania
- Luxembourg
- Latvia
- Germany
- France
- Italy
- Spain
- Cyprus
- Portugal
- Slovenia

localize.full_text:

- 葡
- 斯洛文尼亚
